summary: Difference and browsing abilities for a PVCS archive.
name: PVCS-access
description:
Allows PVCS users to view differences by previous version, specified version, or between two versions in vdiff or gvim diff formats.

Allows user to browse all archive versions of the current file.

Tested with version 6.0.10. Refer to your PVCS documentation for support.
install_details:
Place in your script directory (usually vimfiles) and launch from within vim.

Modify to match your environment before usage.
